sub_title: Experienced pro who pulls people together for investment promotion, area marketing, market entry and real-estate
summary:
I support companies, regional development and investment promotion agencies with the development of new business activities and to position themselves powerfully in international markets, e.g. in The Netherlands, Germany or Asia.

I provide
▼International business development and location and site selection for private companies in various industries such as: food, agro, life sciences, clean-tech, machinery, renewable energy, automotive, IT, and creative industries
▼Investment promotion and economic development for public entities such as city, regional and national governments
▼Flexibility and diversified expertise through the cooperation with qualified partners in the field of market entry services and city strategy
▼A strong network among companies, governments and intermediary organizations

Services and products
▼Market research, SWOT analysis, feasibility analysis
▼Benchmark and competitiveness analysis
▼Real Estate acquisition/disposal, valuation support
▼International market entry, acquisition and area marketing:
   › Strategy development
   › Action plans and business plans for international market entry, innovation, acquisition and  area marketing
   › Operational support for the implementation of action plans;
   › Interim management

Karres Development Advisory and ARCUSplus have joined forces to attract companies from the Netherlands to regional development agencies in Germany and vice versa. With their 'cluster matchmaking' they appeal to a growing need for strategy and matchmaking between Dutch and German technology clusters. For more information: https://karres-arcusplus.de/

Karres Development Advisory
▼Market Entry Services▼Area Marketing and City Strategy▼Implementation support
             
Mobile: +31 6 3008 2209
Email: marcel@karresdevelopment.nl
Web: www.karresdevelopment.nl

projects.title: International location selection and property identification support
projects.description:
Location benchmark and site selection projects in Asia, Latam, Central and Eastern Europe for multiple MNC’s and medium sized companies (various industries: manufacturing, logistics and other operations).
▼Corporate client in the creative sector: Quick Scan location and real estate solution in the greater Amsterdam area.

contributors.headline: Experienced pro who pulls people together for investment promotion, area marketing, market entry and real-estate

profile_positions.description:
International Business and Trade Development - Market Entry Services Asia - Investment Promotion

Profile
With my multidisciplinary and international experience I work with clients to identify and create new directions and to achieve growth. My assets in the work area include a developed strategic insight, a proven ability to ‘bridge cultures’, a good understanding of innovative technology and ample experience with the decision making process regarding corporate (international) investments. Next to this I have an open eye for the human aspect and I take an active role to determine and consolidate stakeholder interests.
After a business oriented study at the Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences (Hogeschool van Amsterdam) I have gathered extensive international experience at two large organizations: Ernst & Young Real Estate Advisory Services (Transaction Advisory Services) and the Dutch Ministry of Economic Affairs (Netherlands Foreign Investment Agency).
Over 8 years I lived and worked in three different countries (Japan, Taiwan and Germany). I learned to deal with cultural differences in a corporate environment. Decision makers in numerous business sectors were my counterpart. Careful listening, analysis and identifying opportunities enable me to support companies who want to grow their business abroad. At Ernst & Young I further developed consulting experience through the acquisition and execution of assignments in the area of international location and site selection and decision support, spatial economy, real estate, land development and corporate investment. I supported multinational companies in the life sciences, food, automotive, personal care, chemical, electronics and machinery equipment industry. These projects focused on regions in East and South Asia, Central and Eastern Europe, Middle East and Latam.
profile_positions.title: Independent Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Jester Strategy is een strategisch adviesbureau dat zich richt op het versterken van de strategische conversatie binnen organisaties. De huidige onvoorspelbare externe omgeving maakt het noodzakelijk dat organisaties zich trainen om veranderingen snel te herkennen en voortvarend te acteren. Jester Strategy maakt gebruik van bewezen adviesmodellen en online technologie om het strategisch leervermogen van organisaties en executives te versterken.

Jester Strategy is a strategic consulting firm that focuses on strengthening the strategic conversation within organizations. The current unpredictable external environment compels companies to recognize changes quickly and act decisive. Jester Strategy uses proven models and online technology to strengthen the strategic learning ability of organizations and executives.
